pages.title: The Moon
pages.text: Congratulations on reaching the moon! The moon is a barren wasteland, grey and dead, as far as the eye can see; however, underground is where you will find the next major resource in Beyond Earth - Desh! Desh is used to craft advanced machines, space stations, and the tier two rocket.

pages.title: Returning Home
pages.text: To return back to earth, open your lander (shift + right-click) and collect the rocket, fuel and the launch pads. To remove the lander, punch it. Set up the launch pad, place the rocket down and fill it up with fuel. Press $(k:jump) and fly back to earth.
